“ Everyone shall have the right to compensation for damage caused by the unlawful acts of a person or body when performing a function or engaged in an activity on behalf of a state or local authority or as a holder of public office . ... ”

CARDINAL . If a court is responsible for undue delay in the proceedings and an individual has sustained pecuniary damage as a result , he or she may claim compensation from the ORG under LAW CARDINAL ( PERSON zakonik ) . The person seeking compensation will thus have to prove , firstly , that there has been a delay in the proceedings ; secondly , that damage has occurred and , thirdly , that there is a causal link between the conduct of the court and the damage sustained .
